answers.answer: i have 6 days left and this is my 1st. no contractions or signs of labor. im getting nervous as well, i dont want to be induced.
Me either! I have no signs of anything hoping she comes before my due date or dr will induce. I'm getting so anxious and scared.

Look At It In A Positive Way Tho. At Least If U Get Induced U Know Your Doctor Will Be There To Deliver And U Wong Be Faced With An On Call Doctor That U Arnt Used To. I Didn't Want To Be Induced With My First Little Girl But IM Glad I Did. I Hope That I Will Make It To Be Induced This Time As Well (35+6). Good Luck ladies
Thank you that made me feel a little better
my dr doesnt even consider induction until 41wks, so i have a little time left. but she seems comfy in there so we will see lol
Why will your doctor induce if she's not here by your due date? That seems a little crazy to me. Are you high risk for some reason?
I'm not high risk but she said I would be safe getting induced by then.  And sorta pushed me towards it.
You can refuse induction. Unless it's medically indicated for some reason (a week plus overdue, preeclampsia, gd, etc) you do not have to induce.

question: I have 8 days left and it seems unreal... Do contractions just suddenly hit or do they gradually come on? I'm so nervous
title: 8 days
